clinical_study.brief_title: Dysphagia Handicap Index: A Structured Translation From English to German
clinical_study.official_title: Dysphagia Handicap Index: A Structured Translation From English to German of a Quality of Life Questionnaire Relating to Swallowing

brief_summary.textblock: Establishment of a questionnaire in German to determine in a structured and quantifiable manner the quality of life of patients with dysphagia.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients able to fully understand and fill out the german translation of the questionnaire.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Patients suffering from dysphagia for at least half a year will be asked to answer the questionnaire at the time of enrolment.
primary_outcome.description: Establishment of a questionnaire in german to determine in a structured and quantifiable manner the quality of life of patients with dysphagia.

intervention.intervention_name: Pretest and validation of a translated questionnaire

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria: All patients with dysphagia
Exclusion criteria: Inability to fill in the questionnaire
